game.title: NodeCore

long_description:
***This mod is for NodeCore only.***

Capture opposing team(s)'s crystals and bring them to yours. Trap your enemies and don't get trapped!
Fight opposing team with complex machines in Nodecorian gameplay.
# Features:
* Nice colored crystals, 4 per team.
* Up to 6 teams, every team has it's own color.
* No direct PvP, build traps.
* Map size is limited and has nice neon borders.
* Democracy: players decide when to start the game, and when to end it.
name: nc_ctf
short_description: (NOT IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS BAD - DO NOT USE) Capture The Flag for NodeCore
title: NodeCore CTF
